FAIL_TO_PASS: when program has value/no flag specified with value then specified value
when program has yes/no not specified then error
when program has mandatory-yes/mandatory-no flag specified with flag then true
when program has required value default then default value
when call .requiredOption() then returns this
when program has yes/no flag specified negated then false
when program has required value specified then value as specified
when missing mandatory option then shows help
when program has optional option not specified then error
when program has required value not specified and subcommand then error
when program has required option not specified and --help then help
when program has required option not specified then error
when program has required option not specified and subcommand --help then help
when pass Option to .requiredOption() then throw
when command has required value but not called then no error
when program has option with name different than property then still recognised
when program has required value specified and subcommand then specified value
when command has required value specified then no error and option has specified value
when program has optional value flag specified then true
when requiredOption with implied value then not throw
